summary: The Patient-Centered Outcomes Research Institute is a federally funded, nonprofit corporation that was established to fund and evaluate research aimed at helping patients, doctors, and policymakers make better health care decisions. PCORI is required to have its financial statements audited annually, and we're required to review those audits. title: Patient-Centered Outcomes Research Institute: Review of the Audit of the FY 2022 Financial Statements
